author: serge
msg: Changing MailetException to extend MessagingException.  Had originally modeled exception off of ServletException, but MessagingException gives same feature (arguably better), and removes declaration of two exception types all over JAMES.  Also fixed issue with changing from user manager to user repository.  Also cleaned up remote delivery slightly so it properly starts counting retries.

author: serge

msg: Changing MailetException to extend MessagingException. author: serge
msg: Updated to handle removal of user manager class, instead, just use the shared local user repository.  Also made bounce method properly set content type (weird javamail trick not getting called with the way we handle mime messages).
